Massachusetts law governing custody modi.raw_text: Massachusetts law governing custody modifications and the court's general continuing jurisdiction over custody determinations.
Massachusetts law governing custody modi.proposition: 2.2 This Court has jurisdiction to modify custody and parenting time established by prior court order under Massachusetts law governing custody modifications and the court's general continuing jurisdiction over custody determinations.

Massachusetts family law.proposition: 8.1 Under Massachusetts family law, a court may modify an existing custody order upon showing a material and substantial change in circumstances since the entry of the prior order and a demonstration that the requested modification is in the best interests of the child.

applicable provisions of the Massachuset.raw_text: applicable provisions of the Massachusetts General Laws regarding custody and modification

Massachusetts law.proposition: Massachusetts law requires proof of a material change in circumstances and a best-interests showing to modify custody; please have an attorney or trusted legal resource supplement this Complaint with the precise statutory and case citations you wish to rely upon.
